question: 宛名
sourceMnemonic:
The <kanji>address</kanji> <kanji>name</kanji> is the name that's on the address, making it the <vocabulary>addressee</vocabulary>. This can also mean <vocabulary>name and address</vocabulary>.

This can be used for both physical mail and email.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>宛</ja> is the same one you learned for the kanji. The reading for <ja>名</ja> comes from the kun'yomi reading, which you learned in the vocabulary word <ja>名</ja> and <ja>名前</ja>. So, the reading for this word is <reading><ja>あてな</ja></reading>.
